sen.j: 御真津比売命（みまつひめのみこと、生没年不詳）は、開化天皇の皇女。
sen.e: Princess Mimatsuhime (Mimatsuhime no Mikoto; the dates of her birth and death are unknown) was a princess of the Emperor Kaika.
Princess Mimatsuhime (Mimatsuhime no Mikoto; the dates of her birth and death are unknown) was a princess of the Emperor Kaika.
Princess Mimatsuhime (Mimatsuhime no Mikoto; the dates of her birth and death are unknown) was a princess of the Emperor Kaika.
Princess Mimatsuhime (御真津比売命) was also written in this way, "Mimatsuhime no Mikoto (御真津姫命)."
Princess Mimatsuhime (御真津比売命) was also written in this way, Mimatsuhime no Mikoto (御真津姫命).
sen.cmt: ダブルクオートを削除しました。
sen.e: Princess Mimatsuhime (御真津比売命) was also written in this way, Mimatsuhime no Mikoto (御真津姫命).
The mother of Princess Mimatsuhime was Ikagashikome no Mikoto.
The mother of Princess Mimatsuhime was Ikagashikome no Mikoto.
The mother of Princess Mimatsuhime was Ikagashikome no Mikoto.

sen.j: 同母兄に、崇神天皇がいる。
sen.e: Emperor Sujin (崇神天皇) was the maternal brother (son of the Emperor Kaika) of Princess Mimatsuhime.
Emperor Sujin was his maternal half-brother.
sen.cmt: 同母兄のところ、変更しました。
sen.e: Emperor Sujin was his maternal half-brother.
